metadata.title: CVE-2018-19205 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Roundcube before 1.3.7 mishandles GnuPG MDC integrity-protection warnings,which makes it easier for attackers to obtain sensitive information, arelated issue to CVE-2017-17688. This is associated withplugins/enigma/lib/enigma_driver_gnupg.php.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
